showcase.title: Our Experiences
showcase.description: Discover the different facets of Le Lof, from our refined cuisine to our vibrant evenings.

gastronomy.title: The Epicure's Table
gastronomy.description: A fusion cuisine between Africa and the West, conceived as a true gastronomic experience.

ambiance.title: The Lof Ambiance
ambiance.description: A luminous and vegetal oasis in the heart of the city, the signature of the place for your evenings.

brunch.title: The Brunches
brunch.description: The unmissable Sunday meeting in Abidjan, generous and musical.

events.title: The Evenings
events.description: Live bands, DJs, refined atmosphere for your Abidjan nights.

about.title: About us
about.description: Born from a passion for African flavors and the desire to elevate them, Le Lof is a place where tradition meets modernity. Here, every plate tells a story, that of a continent rich in colors, spices, and emotions. Our team of enthusiasts promises you an unforgettable culinary journey, between authenticity and creativity.

menuPage.title: Our menu
menuPage.description: A culinary journey through the authentic and refined flavors of Africa.

miniBrochettes.name: Mini chicken yassa skewers
miniBrochettes.description: Tender chicken marinated in Yassa sauce, served with a refreshing green sauce.

croquettesTubercules.name: Tuber croquettes with herbs
croquettesTubercules.description: Mix of local tubers in crispy croquettes, with a creamy herb sauce.

veloutePatatesDouces.name: Sweet potato and coconut velouté
veloutePatatesDouces.description: Creamy sweet potato and coconut milk soup, garnished with a crispy topping.

saladeFraicheur.name: Freshness salad
saladeFraicheur.description: A mix of arugula, watermelon, cheese, and a mango vinaigrette.

carpaccioAnanas.name: Pineapple carpaccio, passion fruit vinaigrette, seared shrimp
carpaccioAnanas.description: Thin slices of fresh pineapple, exotic passion fruit vinaigrette, and lightly seared shrimp.

filetBoeuf.name: Beef fillet, mushroom sauce
filetBoeuf.description: Tender beef fillet topped with a rich mushroom sauce, served with homemade mashed potatoes.

magretCanard.name: Duck breast, red wine sauce, sweet potato purée
magretCanard.description: Pink-cooked duck breast, a full-bodied red wine sauce, and a creamy sweet potato purée.

carreAgneauRoti.name: Roasted rack of lamb with African herbs
carreAgneauRoti.description: A noble piece of meat enhanced by a full-bodied juice.

paveCapitaineRoti.name: Roasted captain fish steak
paveCapitaineRoti.description: A fine and delicate fish, simply cooked to reveal its flavors.

demiPintadeRoti.name: Roasted half guinea fowl, ginger-honey sauce
demiPintadeRoti.description: Tender and flavorful guinea fowl with a sweet and spicy sauce.

gambasGrillees.name: Grilled prawns, bissap-lemongrass sauce
gambasGrillees.description: Juicy prawns with a unique floral and tangy sauce.

lofTerroirFusion.name: Lof Terroir Fusion
lofTerroirFusion.description: Homemade brioche bun, local beef steak, melted cheese, sweet chili sauce, sweet potato fries.

lofSupremeFusion.name: Lof Supreme Fusion
lofSupremeFusion.description: Homemade brioche bun, crispy chicken breast, vegetable achard, coconut yogurt sauce, plantain chips.

lofGreenFusion.name: Lof Green Fusion
lofGreenFusion.description: Homemade turmeric brioche bun, veggie patty (red bean sweet potato), avocado, sweet bissap mustard sauce.

fonioPilaf.name: Fonio pilaf with crispy vegetables
fonioPilaf.description: Ancient grain cooked as a pilaf with fresh, crispy vegetables.

fonioCremeux.name: Creamy fonio with crispy vegetables
fonioCremeux.description: A creamy version of our fonio with vegetables.

choukouyaMouton.name: Mutton choukouya
choukouyaMouton.description: Mutton grilled to perfection with traditional spices.

choukouyaPoulet.name: Chicken choukouya
choukouyaPoulet.description: Marinated and grilled chicken, a classic of Ivorian street food.

fritesPatateDouce.name: Sweet potato fries
fritesPatateDouce.description: Homemade sweet potato fries, slightly sweet and crispy.

fritesIgname.name: Yam fries
fritesIgname.description: Original yam fries, a tasty alternative.

rizCoco.name: Coconut rice
rizCoco.description: Fragrant rice cooked with coconut milk.

pureeTaro.name: Taro purée
pureeTaro.description: Creamy purée of taro, a tuber with a delicate taste.

legumesGrilles.name: Grilled seasonal vegetables
legumesGrilles.description: Assortment of fresh seasonal vegetables, simply grilled.

attieke.name: Attiéké
attieke.description: Traditional cassava semolina, a must-have Ivorian side dish.

alloco.name: Alloco
alloco.description: Fried ripe plantain pieces, a sweet and savory classic.

parisBrest.name: Revisited Paris-Brest
parisBrest.description: Craquelin choux pastry, creamy peanut cream for an African touch.

cheesecakeMangue.name: Mango cheesecake
cheesecakeMangue.description: Crispy base, light cream, and an exotic mango coulis.

tartelettesChocolat.name: Revisited 3 chocolates tartlets
tartelettesChocolat.description: An intense treat for chocolate lovers.

crumbleAnanas.name: Pineapple and lime crumble
crumbleAnanas.description: Freshness and indulgence with this fruity and tangy crumble.

sorbetMangue.name: Mango
sorbetMangue.description: Homemade sorbets, depending on the season.

sorbetPassion.name: Passion Fruit
sorbetPassion.description: Homemade sorbets, depending on the season.

sorbetBissap.name: Bissap
sorbetBissap.description: Homemade sorbets, depending on the season.

sorbetTamarin.name: Tamarind
sorbetTamarin.description: Homemade sorbets, depending on the season.

sorbetBaobab.name: Baobab
sorbetBaobab.description: Homemade sorbets, depending on the season.

sorbetCitron.name: Lemon
sorbetCitron.description: Homemade sorbets, depending on the season.

sauceGraine.name: Palm nut soup with oxtail
sauceGraine.description: A rich and savory classic of Ivorian cuisine.

saucePistache.name: Pistachio sauce with guinea fowl
saucePistache.description: A creamy sauce made from African pistachios and guinea fowl.

sauceGouagouassou.name: Gouagouassou sauce with oxtail
sauceGouagouassou.description: A typical eggplant sauce, simmered with oxtail.

kedjenouPintade.name: Guinea fowl Kedjenou
kedjenouPintade.description: Guinea fowl stewed with vegetables and spices.

soupePecheur.name: Fisherman's soup
soupePecheur.description: Rich soup with fresh seafood and fish.

ragoutJarret.name: Beef shank ragout
ragoutJarret.description: A comforting and flavorful slow-cooked dish.

sauceFeuille.name: Leaf sauce with meat / fish
sauceFeuille.description: Sauce made from sweet potato leaves or other greens, simmered with meat or fish.

sauceGombo.name: Okra sauce with meat / fish
sauceGombo.description: Slimy sauce made from okra, with meat or fish.

sauceArachide.name: Peanut sauce with meat
sauceArachide.description: The famous mafé sauce, creamy and tasty.

tchep.name: Tchep with fish / meat
tchep.description: The Senegalese national dish, rice cooked in a rich broth.

akwabaLof.name: Akwaba Lof
akwabaLof.description: Bissap, ginger, homemade spice, mint leaves

virginMojito.name: Virgin Mojito
virginMojito.description: Mint leaves, lemon, sugar, sparkling water

boraBora.name: Bora Bora
boraBora.description: Passion fruit juice, pineapple juice, lemon, grenadine syrup

punchDuLof.name: Punch du Lof
punchDuLof.description: Coconut juice, pineapple juice, clove, white rum, Malibu, vodka

sexyBaby.name: Sexy Baby
sexyBaby.description: Cinnamon, clove, lemon juice, orange juice, amber rum

miaNazir.name: Mia Nazir
miaNazir.description: Small cola, hibiscus leaf, cane syrup, vanilla syrup, orange juice, lemon juice, white rum

perfectIce.name: Perfect Ice
perfectIce.description: Nutmeg, cocoa powder, fresh cream, caramel purée

brunch.title: Brunch
brunch.short: A gourmet and convivial moment of sharing for your weekends.
brunch.long: Our brunch formula is an invitation to relaxation and indulgence. Every weekend, discover a varied buffet with sweet and savory flavors, hot dishes, pastries, fresh juices, and revisited African specialties. It's the perfect opportunity to get together with family or friends in a warm atmosphere.

private.title: Private culinary experience
private.short: A chef at your disposal for an exclusive and memorable evening.
private.long: Experience an exceptional evening with our private culinary experience. One of our chefs is entirely dedicated to your table to create a tailor-made menu according to your desires. It is the ideal formula for a special occasion, a romantic dinner, or an intimate celebration, where each dish is a work of art.

buffet.title: Buffet
buffet.short: An abundance of flavors for your events and celebrations.
buffet.long: For your events, we offer a generous and varied buffet formula. A wide range of our best creations, from appetizers to desserts, is presented to delight all your guests. Ideal for birthdays, professional receptions, or any other major celebration.

updates.title: Our news
updates.description: Stay informed of our latest news, events, and special offers.

decor.title: The chic ethnic decor
decor.description: Our chic ethnic decor creates a warm and welcoming atmosphere, ideal for savoring revisited traditional dishes. Every detail, from the works of art to the furniture, reflects the cultural richness of the African continent while offering a modern touch.

ambiance.title: The ambiance
ambiance.description: At LOF, each meal becomes a unique sensory experience. Soft background music, a soothing atmosphere, subdued lighting, a warm setting.

activities.title: The Activities
activities.description: Vibrate to the rhythm of our live evenings, discover acoustic talents, have fun during our karaoke sessions, or enjoy our themed buffets.

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.description: A glimpse of the Lof experience: our setting, our atmosphere, our dishes.

quote.title: Make a reservation
quote.description: Organize your next event with us. Fill out the form below.
